name: RussianReversal
0:
”Alexa, Ask Russian Reversal to tell me a joke.”
”Alexa, Ask Russian Reversal for a joke.”
”Alexa, tell Russian Reversal to give me a new joke.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: russian reversal
des: Popularized by Yakov Smirnoff, the Russian Reversal flips a sentence around to provide a humorous hyperbole of political differentiation between (usually) America and Russia.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
